abstract: Eight weeks after the annual South by Southwest Interactive conference, Austin again became a hub for creative technologists. The CHI 2012 conference is an annual gathering for researchers who focus on human-computer interaction (HCI). I spoke to CHI General Conference Chair Joseph Konstan to get his take on where the field of HCI is headed and how it applies to media and journalism.

headline.main: CHI 2012 Conference Q&A With Joseph Konstan
